analysis.description:
TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/12/0x9f7695548e0bbe41e583dac026866e2b10e11b3a.sol#544-554) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/12/0x9f7695548e0bbe41e583dac026866e2b10e11b3a.sol#549-550)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/12/0x9f7695548e0bbe41e583dac026866e2b10e11b3a.sol#567-570) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/12/0x9f7695548e0bbe41e583dac026866e2b10e11b3a.sol#568-570)

NmxCrowdsale.getCurrentRate (/unique_chucks/12/0x9f7695548e0bbe41e583dac026866e2b10e11b3a.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- elapsedTime < timeRange.div(2) (/unique_chucks/12/0x9f7695548e0bbe41e583dac026866e2b10e11b3a.sol)
